title: ECharts legend component
description: legend component config. Use as top-level key in ECharts option.

padding.description:
Padding between legend item and border.
Support to be a single number or an array.

selected.description: selected map of each item. Default to be selected if item is not in the map

selector.description: Buttons for all select or inverse select.

selectorLabel.description: Props: show, position, distance, rotate, offset, minMargin, overflow, ellipsis, silent, precision, valueAnimation, rich, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, fontSize, align, verticalAlign, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, width, height, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

selectorButtonGap.description: Gap between selector buttons group and legend main items.

tooltip.description: Tooltip option. Props: show, triggerOn, alwaysShowContent, formatter, valueFormatter, position, confine, align, verticalAlign, showDelay, hideDelay, transitionDuration, enterable, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderRadius, borderWidth, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY, padding, extraCssText, textStyle

inactiveColor.description: Color when legend item is not selected

inactiveBorderColor.description: Border color when legend item is not selected

inactiveBorderWidth.description: Border color when legend item is not selected

itemStyle.description: Props: color, opacity, decal, borderRadius, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderCap, borderJoin, borderDashOffset, borderMiterLimit

lineStyle.description: Props: inactiveColor, inactiveWidth, width, color, opacity, type, cap, join, dashOffset, miterLimit, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

textStyle.description: Props: show, position, distance, rotate, offset, minMargin, overflow, ellipsis, silent, precision, valueAnimation, rich, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, fontSize, align, verticalAlign, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, width, height, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY
